main.name: TRIII
main.description: I am a Full-Stack Web Developer of the future
main.bio: I graduated from Hofstra University with a B.B.A in      Management and a Certificate in Full Stack Web Developer from University of Irvine. I like to create and explore somehow I dabbled in code which soon turned into a passion. There will be many innovative application in the future and I want to be part of it.
